prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Piano, Synth Pad, Organ, Bass, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
Guitar, Piano, Synth Pad, Organ, Bass - this song has it all, but no Drums.

Style 2:
No Drums, but this song still has a lot of musical elements - Guitar, Piano, Synth Pad, Organ, Bass.

Style 3:
This song is composed of Guitar, Piano, Synth Pad, Organ, Bass - all without the addition of Drums.
